data.title: Exago BI Software
data.meta_description: ExagoBISoftware.com is now part of insightsoftware.com.
data.text:
Exago, a premier embedded BI solution that provides leading companies with seamless integration for customer-facing web applications, is now a part of the insightsoftware family.

By acquiring Exago, insightsoftware bolsters its market leadership in embedded analytics further empowering software teams to deliver compelling self-service analytics to their users. By uniting the Exago and Logi Analytics teams, Exago’s customers and channel partners now have access to a broader portfolio of solutions that connect to a wide range of ERP and EPM systems.

Need Support?

If you are an existing Exago customer in need of technical support, please reach out to our fully staffed support team.

Download Software?

If you are an existing Exago customer, you can download the latest releases via the Exago Support Center.

Additional Licenses?

Please submit the form below or call +1 (919) 872-7800 to add additional software licenses to your account.
